sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row class="list px-3 mx-auto">
    <v-col cols="12" md="8">
      <v-text-field v-model="title" label="Search by Title"></v-text-field>
    </v-col>

    <v-col cols="12" md="4">
      <v-btn small @click="searchTitle">
        Search
      </v-btn>
    </v-col>

    <v-col cols="12" sm="12">
      <v-card class="mx-auto" tile>
        <v-card-title>Devices</v-card-title>

        <v-data-table
          :headers="headers"
          :items="devices"
          disable-pagination
          :hide-default-footer="true"
        >
          <template v-slot:[`item.actions`]="{ item }">
            <v-icon small class="mr-2" @click="editDevice(item.id)">mdi-pencil</v-icon>
            <v-icon small @click="deleteDevice(item.id)">mdi-delete</v-icon>
          </template>
        </v-data-table>

        <v-card-actions v-if="devices.length > 0">
          <v-btn small color="error" @click="removeAllDevices">
            Remove All
          </v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
      </v-card>
    </v-col>
  </v-row>
</template>

<script>
import DeviceDataService from "../services/DeviceDataService";
export default {
  name: "devices-list",
  data() {
    return {
      devices: [],
      title: "",
      headers: [
        { text: "Title", align: "start", sortable: false, value: "title" },
        { text: "Description", value: "description", sortable: false },
        { text: "Price", value: "price", sortable: false },
        { text: "Brand", value: "brand", sortable: false },
        { text: "Condition", value: "condition", sortable: false },
        { text: "Available", value: "available", sortable: false },
        { text: "In stock", value: "in_stock", sortable: false },
        { text: "Warranty", value: "warranty", sortable: false },
        { text: "Delivery options", value: "delivery_options", sortable: false },
        { text: "Status", value: "status", sortable: false },
        { text: "Actions", value: "actions", sortable: false },
      ],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    retrieveDevices() {
      DeviceDataService.getAll()
        .then((response) => {
          this.devices = response.data.map(this.getDisplayDevice);
          console.log(response.data);
        })
        .catch((e) => {
          console.log(e);
        });
    },

    refreshList() {
      this.retrieveDevices();
    },

    removeAllDevices() {
      DeviceDataService.deleteAll()
        .then((response) => {
          console.log(response.data);
          this.refreshList();
        })
        .catch((e) => {
          console.log(e);
        });
    },

    searchTitle() {
      DevicelDataService.findByTitle(this.title)
        .then((response) => {
          this.devices = response.data.map(this.getDisplayDevice);
          console.log(response.data);
        })
        .catch((e) => {
          console.log(e);
        });
    },

    editDevice(id) {
      this.$router.push({ name: "device-details", params: { id: id } });
    },

    deleteDevice(id) {
      DeviceDataService.delete(id)
        .then(() => {
          this.refreshList();
        })
        .catch((e) => {
          console.log(e);
        });
    },

    getDisplayDevice(device) {
      return {
        id: device.id,
        title: device.title.length > 30 ? device.title.substr(0, 30) + "..." : device.title,
        description: device.description.length > 30 ? device.description.substr(0, 30) + "..." : device.description,
        price: device.price.length > 30 ? device.price.substr(0, 30) + "..." : device.price,
        brand: device.brand.length > 30 ? device.brand.substr(0, 30) + "..." : device.brand,
        condition: device.condition.length > 30 ? device.condition.substr(0, 30) + "..." : device.condition,
        available: device.available.length > 30 ? device.available.substr(0, 30) + "..." : device.available,
        in_stock: device.in_stock.length > 30 ? device.in_stock.substr(0, 30) + "..." : device.in_stock,
        warranty: device.warranty.length > 30 ? device.warranty.substr(0, 30) + "..." : device.warranty,
        delivery_options: device.delivery_options.length > 30 ? device.delivery_options.substr(0, 30) + "..." : device.delivery_options,
        status: device.published ? "Published" : "Pending",
      };
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.retrieveDevices();
  },
};
</script>

<style>
.list {
  max-width: 750px;
}
</style>
